title: Cau Giay, Hanoi ne
description: About my roommate at 44, 66/18 Dich Vong Hau, Cau Giay, Hanoi
author: Ngoc Duc

images.caption: Giao diện chính của Secomus AI Platform
Bảng điều khiển phân tích dữ liệu

content: I joined Secomus Technology as a core AI Engineer. My role involves developing and implementing AI solutions to enhance our products and services. I work closely with a team of talented engineers and data scientists to create innovative solutions that leverage the power of artificial intelligence. My journey at Secomus has been both challenging and rewarding. I have had the opportunity to work on various projects, from natural language processing to computer vision. Each project has allowed me to expand my knowledge and skills in AI, and I am excited to continue growing in this field.
